General.Name: Rastar Group
General.Description: Rastar Group manufactures and sells licensed model cars in China. The company offers R/C auto models, die cast cars, ride-on products, and baby safety car seats under RASTAR and Rastar Baby brand names. It exports its products to approximately 47 countries, primarily Europe, Japan, Hong Kong, the United States, Australia, Singapore, and Korea. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shantou, China.
